data.text: @V_Quaesitor Some people say Africa was very diligent due to their experience with Ebola. I just don't know. Brazil got hit bad, but no sign of that in central Africa.
@V_Quaesitor That's too bad! Another question is what's up with Africa? Besides S. Africa and a few other countries, Africa doesn't show much Covid on the databases.

@danaludwig My understanding is, at least in a few states, they handed out early treatment kits to residents. In those kits, a contents list was included. A while ago, I saw a photo of one on Twitter. From what I recall of the list, IVM, Doxycycline, and Vitamin D (not D3) were included. 🤔
@V_Quaesitor Luck? Nobody knows. My friend in India is not impressed by their public health measures
@danaludwig Racism and discrimination against the weak and vulnerable…. Wait for the next wave https://t.co/D7KSDg58GZ
@danaludwig Thanks ☺️ could it also be about them having a stronger immune system?

@Zekoala Africa seems low too (except South Africa). I could only guess - maybe less physical mobility in those areas? Maybe the virus doesn't like hot humid climates?  When India had their horrible surge, it was limited to just certain parts of the country, I believe.
